name: Digiphy
description: Digiphy is a SaaS marketing platform that activates physical products and marketing assets, transforming them into an always-on digital marketing channel. We combine page building with connected technology to seamlessly bridge physical and digital.
one_liner: Digiphy is a SaaS marketing platform that activates physical products and marketing assets, transforming them into an always-on digital marketing channel. We combine page building with connected technology to seamlessly bridge physical and digital.
